title: ATTENTION RENTER! FIRST TIME HOME BUYER CAN BUY WITH $3000-$4000 DOWN!
posting_body: TIRED OF DEALING WITH THE RENT INCREASE!!!
THE TIME IS NOW TO OWN YOUR HOME!!!
You can purchase this house with as little as $3000-$4000 down.
How much would renting with first month rent, last month rent plus security deposit will cost you?
You can use the MyHome Assistance & ZIP Program from Cal HFA, along with the government assist of 3% down to buy your first home.
It is truly a great program to buy your first home with as little as $3000-$4000 down.
There is no better time than now if you are first time home buyer.
There are unbelievable deals on properties throughout Southern California and number of programs available for any buyer.
You will not know what you qualify for unless you take the first step.
The pre-approval process is free so it cannot hurt to see if you qualify and it only takes a few minutes of your time to find out.
You owe it to yourself that you have the option to own.
Please call to a free consultation today.
CALL TODAY
